pages.text: $(li)The Ignited Revenant is what is left of the poor soul of a $(l:patchouli:creatures/outvoted/wildfire)Wildfire$(/l) that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/burning_arena)Burning Arena$(/l) over the Nether.$(br)$(li)This creature it is very resistant and use its shields to protect itself.$(br)$(li)It drops $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/burning_ashes)Burning Ashes$(/l) on death.
